channel.title: Drop Party System [562]
channel.description: I am using 562 Painzone base and thought it would be cool to add in a drop party system of some sort. I am bad at following tutorials but i was wondering if someone could help me. I have looked everywhere for a drop party tutorial and i found two and tried them and one didn't work and the other gave errors. Please help, you guys are all I got to turn to for help.

Thank but i dnt really understand what you have given me ^

item.description:
@Tu1 wrote:

for(int x = n; x < n; x++) {
   for(int y = n; y < n; y++) {
      // function that spawns an item at x, y following the random id
   }
}
